content: Founders are not all bad and I understand your point about bro-culture and rightfully so. However, the innovation and job creation and risk founders take is far more than the folks chiming in from the seats watching the game. Founders are better off around and frankly there are way more examples of shitty investors who bounce founders than shitty founders. In the case of Uber and Snap those guys created so much value they wrote their own ticket and we can’t control that except boycott their product.
